programme.title: Chroniques d'en haut
programme.desc:
Champsaur, the two faces of a valley
Home to the sources of the River Drac, in the Hautes-Alpes, the Champsaur Valley perfectly combines tourism and a thriving local community. Winter sports and agriculture help keep the valley in balance, whatever the season.
Presented by: Laurent Guillaume.

programme.title: Sur les sentiers de l'histoire
programme.desc:
In Gallo-Roman Provence

Whilst the Gallic Wars were being fought between most of the Celtic tribes and the all-powerful Roman Empire, the south of France had already become a Gallo-Roman civilisation. What was Transalpine Gaul, or Gallia Narbonensis, is still home to major remains from the period that gave it its name, Provence.

Directed by: Denis Dommel (France, 2019)

programme.title: Curieux Bégin
programme.desc: The sandwich challenge Forget the crustless sandwich as we bring you a world of sandwiches redesigned by Samir Benzeguir, alias Capitain Sandwich. We sample Montréal's best banh mi and a gluten-free special by K pour Katrine. Presenter : Christian Bégin.

programme.title: Chroniques d'en haut
programme.desc:
Champsaur, the two faces of a valley
Home to the sources of the River Drac, in the Hautes-Alpes, the Champsaur Valley perfectly combines tourism and a thriving local community. Winter sports and agriculture help keep the valley in balance, whatever the season.
Presented by: Laurent Guillaume.

programme.title: Les petites bulles
programme.desc: We are what we eat "I am what I eat..." is what André Giordan physiologist and epistemologist from Geneva University, invites us to understand.

programme.title: Massi en mission
programme.desc: The astronaut David Saint-Jacques challenges the YouTuber Massi Mahiou to prepare for a future space mission. But how exactly do astronauts train? What sort of experiments do they carry out? How do they live with zero gravity? Massi discovers all he needs to know about the mission and about space.

programme.title: L'Afrik en conte
programme.desc: The co-wives A man marries two women, but loves the second more than the first. So the first wife dreams up a scheme to imprison the young woman and her baby inside a tree trunk. Directed by: Franck Fokus (Côte d'Ivoire, 2022)

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
Sometimes you just can't win!
Failing at something is never funny, but it isn't necessarily all that serious either! And, above all, the important thing is to accept that you aren't always going to be the best. Don't you agree Rocky?
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: Curieux Bégin
programme.desc: The sandwich challenge Forget the crustless sandwich as we bring you a world of sandwiches redesigned by Samir Benzeguir, alias Capitain Sandwich. We sample Montréal's best banh mi and a gluten-free special by K pour Katrine. Presenter : Christian Bégin.

programme.title: Confidences à un inconnu
programme.desc:
Saint Petersburg, 1907. Natalia has all she needs for happiness: delightful son, rich husband who lets her live her life as she chooses, lovers who desire her. But that afternoon, a chance meeting with a stranger and a secret wish whispered to a bird change her tranquil life forever...

Directed by: Georges Bardawil (France/Switzerland/Italy.1994)

Cast: Sandrine Bonnaire, William Hurt, Jerzy Radziwilowicz

Genre: Dramedy

programme.title: Celle qui n'avait pas vu « Friends »
Les Newbies
programme.desc:
Episode 1: The missing piece

The failure at the Zoofest has strained the friendship between André and Christian. Amélie finds a surprising idea to try to reconcile them, to succeed she calls on her sister for help.

Directed by: Frédéric Nassif (season 2, Canada, 2019)

Screenplay Christian Essiambre, André Roy, Frédéric Mallet

Cast: Christian Essiambre (Christian), André Roy (André), Luc Leblanc (Luc), Raphaëlle Lalande (Amélie), Catherine Bérubé (Ann-Julie), Marc Lamontagne (Lamont), Chloé Lévesque (Sophie), Matthieu Girard (Jean-Marc), Karène Chiasson (Isabelle)

Genre: Comedy

programme.title: Les Newbies
programme.desc:
Episode 2: Hangover

Having replaced the Newbies by alcohol and Christian has totally lost control, in addition to his memory. Luc doesn't have time to help Christian, he's far too busy being courted by his former boss.

Directed by: Frédéric Nassif (season 2, Canada, 2019)

Screenplay Christian Essiambre, André Roy, Frédéric Mallet

Cast: Christian Essiambre (Christian), André Roy (André), Luc Leblanc (Luc), Raphaëlle Lalande (Amélie), Catherine Bérubé (Ann-Julie), Marc Lamontagne (Lamont), Chloé Lévesque (Sophie), Matthieu Girard (Jean-Marc), Karène Chiasson (Isabelle)

Genre: Comedy

programme.title: Les Newbies
programme.sub-title: Pas de mariage et un enterrement
programme.desc:
Episode 3: No wedding and a funeral

After an embalming ends badly, André is taken on to salvage the reputation of a company of funeral directors. Seeing that the Newbies don't seem likely to get back together again anytime soon, Luc asks Christian to form a new duo with him.

Directed by: Frédéric Nassif (season 2, Canada, 2019)

Screenplay Christian Essiambre, André Roy, Frédéric Mallet

Cast: Christian Essiambre (Christian), André Roy (André), Luc Leblanc (Luc), Raphaëlle Lalande (Amélie), Catherine Bérubé (Ann-Julie), Marc Lamontagne (Lamont), Chloé Lévesque (Sophie), Matthieu Girard (Jean-Marc), Karène Chiasson (Isabelle)

Genre: Comedy

programme.title: Les Newbies
programme.desc:
Episode 4: A touch of the grumpies

The Newbies are finally back again, but not everyone's delighted about it, and a local radio presenter causes them a whole heap of problems. André and Luc have to use all their imagination to calm him down and avoid him wrecking their come-back.

Directed by: Frédéric Nassif (season 2, Canada, 2019)

Screenplay Christian Essiambre, André Roy, Frédéric Mallet

Cast: Christian Essiambre (Christian), André Roy (André), Luc Leblanc (Luc), Raphaëlle Lalande (Amélie), Catherine Bérubé (Ann-Julie), Marc Lamontagne (Lamont), Chloé Lévesque (Sophie), Matthieu Girard (Jean-Marc), Karène Chiasson (Isabelle)

Genre: Comedy

programme.title: Les maîtres de la peinture moderne
programme.desc: Raoul Dufy La trajectoire artistique de Raoul Dufy, qui accompagne les avant-gardes parisiennes du début du XXe siècle, en fait un peintre très original. Aquarelliste et dessinateur suggestif, il est aussi l'auteur d'une gigantesque décoration « La Fée Électricité » pour l'Exposition internationale de 1937 au musée d'Art moderne de Paris. Réalisation : Jacques Vichet (France, 2019)

programme.title: Mémoire de sang
programme.desc:
A man's body has been found on a work site, in a concrete slab. Married with a family he had disappeared eighteen years ago, his reappearance is a shock to his family. But the investigation, headed by the young Lieutenant Camille Gallois, rapidly hits a wall of silence and secrets...

Directed by: Olivier Guignard (France, 2018)

Screenplay: Marie Deshaires, Catherine Touzet

Cast: Isabelle Gélinas (Sandrine), Louise Monot (Louise), Blandine Bellavoir (Camille Gallois), Samir Boitard (Antoine), Pierre Cassignard (Armand), Martin Pautard (Robin), Lou Lambrecht (Amandine), Tomy Leconte (Victor), Gauthier Battoue (Nico), Selma Kouchy (Nora)

Genre: detective

Parental guidance: TV-PG

programme.title: Les maîtres de la peinture moderne
programme.desc: Otto Dix Peintre et graveur allemand, Otto Dix est l'un des fondateurs de la Nouvelle Objectivité, mouvement multidisciplinaire qui tient à représenter le réel sans fard « entre jugement et constat ». Il peint « La Guerre » entre 1928 et 1931. Ses oeuvres sont déclarées « dégénérées » par les nazis. Réalisation : Jacques Vichet (France, 2019)

programme.title: Sur les sentiers de l'histoire
programme.desc:
In the land of the Cathars

From the early Middle Ages to the 11th century, only the northern area of France was unified. Further south, Occitanie was a region of local independent seigniories. An era that saw the first crusades, notably the only one led on Christian soil, between Ariège and Aube, to exterminate the Cathars.

Directed by: Denis Dommel (France, 2019)
